# Chaplain
You are the custodian of the station's chapel, as well as a performer of small miracles through use of a unique sanctified implement.
## Sanctified Item Upon arrival at the station, you'll be able to use a special action on any item in the world to make it [bold]sanctified.[/bold] This will imbue it with special properties, and will also designate the specific type of item chosen as your [bold]sanctified archetype.[/bold]
If your sanctified item is ever destroyed, you will regain the ability to sanctify an item, with one important caveat: [red]You will only be able to sanctify items of the [bold]EXACT SAME kind[/bold] as your sanctified archetype![/red]
For example, if you were to sanctify a flashlight and had it destroyed, you would not be allowed to sanctify a different kind of flashlight, such as ones with different colors or seclites.
Every single item in the game can be sanctified! Pick one that suits your character's beliefs best, or just something that you think might make for interesting roleplay!
## Chaplain Powers ### Blessed Healing While holding or wearing your sanctified item, you can [yellow]heal small amounts of Brute and Burn damage from a target.[/yellow]
### Summon Familiar
While holding or wearing your sanctified item, you can [yellow]summon Remilia, a loyal bat companion[/yellow] who will follow your instructions and help any way she can.
Using this action creates a ghost role that must be taken in order for Remilia to be summoned, so response times to the action may vary.

### Holy Damage
Holy damage is a special damage type that all sanctified items become capable of dealing. Holy damage [yellow]only damages very specific kinds of creatures,[/yellow] all of whom you won't see during standard gameplay.
